@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property docNode. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #docNode}.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #docNode}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a {@link qx.Promise} which resolves to the (computed) value of the property docNode. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #docNode}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property docNode, returns a {@link qx.Promise} which resolves when the value change has fully completed (in the case where there are asynchronous apply methods or events). For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #docNode}.
